welcomeBox.title: Hi. Enter a website address to see mockups of different views.
welcomeBox.info: We give you the ability to preview the website on different devices. We know there are other similar tools... but we try to be the prettiest. Preview is only possible for sites that DON'T have X-Frame Options set to Same Origin or Deny.

sharingModal.title: Copy the address and share
sharingModal.doneAlert: Great. The link is already in your clipboard.
sharingModal.errorAlert: Oops, unable to copy. You need to copy the link manually.

footer.content: It is a beta version of the app. This website is generated using Vue.js. The project repository with the "development roadmap" is available at: https://github.com/paweljgit / i-love-rwd . Wish me luck in my work on the next versions. Please report bugs with github. Have a nice day. :)
